name: Happy Bird Day
description:
Happy bird day – is a game about funny hopping birds searching for seeds and exploring the vast world. Grab your friend and go into a world of fun and joy. You'll have to make an effort to complete this unforgettable adventure.The game is so easy to pick up that anyone can join in the fun, but to complete the levels, you'll need to work hard. People say that those who fully complete the game become true masters of bird control. What about you, are you ready to become one of them?

Co-op

The game is based on two-player co-op. Here, you will need to work together to help two birds reach their desired goal. But what exactly will you have to face?Beat levels, race against the clock, collect seeds, overcome obstacles: jump over pits, dodge thorns and don't trust absolutely every single animal that comes on your way (｡•ᴗ-)｡

Solo Mode

Can't find a friend? Don't worry, just play on your own. Here, you can test your abilities, improve your bird control skills and choose the best level completion tactics.ㅤㅤ Hurry up. The birds are eager to set off on their journey. They're waiting for you!
